law.catch_line: Proposed Preferred Provider Arrangements; Requirements Upon Receipt Of Completed Forms For Reimbursement

text.section: Standards for maintaining quality health care, including satisfying any quality assurance regulations promulgated by any state agency;
Standards for controlling health care costs;
Standards for assuring reasonable levels of access of health care services and an adequate number and geographical distribution of preferred providers to render those services;
Standards for assuring appropriate utilization of health care service; and
Other standards deemed appropriate by the commissioner.
